lead_paragraph: When it opened just over two years ago, many people hoped Revel would save Atlantic City's struggling casino industry, which has been bleeding money and jobs for years.

headline.main: Atlantic City's Revel Casino to Close in September
headline.print_headline: Atlantic City's Revel Casino to Close in September
